title: How to write a valid will for California - Quora

response.answer_text: You are in luck - California has a statutory will form[1]! Download the form and (following the instructions) complete and sign the will in front of two witnesses (who also must sign). Could hardly be easier (unless you retained an estate planning lawyer to prepare a will for you). Footnotes[1] http://www.calbar.ca.gov/Portals/0/documents/publications/Will-Form.pdf
